function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on self-reported data for perceived risk of covid-19 infection and energy usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through in-person data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene during data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal protective equipment ppe during data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density and communal living may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased electricity consumption during pandemic due to stay-at-home mandates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resemblance of electricity usage curve to that of coronavirus quarantines in u.s. and europe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Composition of energy usage groups reflecting demographic differences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants perceiving a low risk of covid-19 infection ≤20%","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential rebounding effects of higher emissions post-pandemic lockdowns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deprioritization of climate-related issues in global agendas due to the health crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive relationship between electricity usage and perceived climate change issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in adoption intention for hems energy and wellbeing features during pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants were not willing to pay for certain hems features, potentially impacting the adoption and implementation of these features.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hems features that contribute to reducing community environmental impacts during the covid-19 pandemic were particularly unpopular, indicating a potential lack of interest in sustainability-focused features.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in willingness to pay for different hems features may lead to unequal access to beneficial features based on cost, potentially exacerbating socioeconomic disparities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparisons of wtp for hems across electricity-use and risk perception groups may lead to unequal access to health-enhancing features based on perceived risk and electricity use.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misinformation and misinterpretation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of risk perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption intention of hems wellbeing features during covid-19 influenced by attitudes, cost concerns, cybersecurity concerns, and demographics such as income, age, and household size.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk perception was found to be positively related to adoption intention of hems with both energy and wellbeing features.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Factors influencing willingness to pay wtp for hems wellbeing features during covid-19, including attitudes, perceived usefulness, and demographic factors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation due to increased use of telemedical services and community updates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased wtp for wellbeing features among older residents)","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Negative impact of technology anxiety on wtp for home security features","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residents’ willingness to adopt and pay for hems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived risk of getting covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Connection between actions and climate change issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low percentage of population viewing climate change as caused by human activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on reducing non-essential economic activities for tackling covid-19 and climate change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social-psychological factors influencing hems technology adoption intention and wtp during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social norms as a strong predictor of adoption intention and willingness to pay for energy-related and well-being features","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variable effects of cost concerns on adoption intention and willingness to pay for energy and well-being features","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relationship between trust in utilities and willingness to pay for well-being features","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Small sample size in new york may not be representative of the entire new york city area or other cities in the u.s.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for cultural differences in social distancing, energy burden, access to technology, and healthy built-home environments may lead to biased findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address social- psychological factors such as perceived fairness and social networks could result in overlooking important risk factors for disease propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Household size may impact the propagation of contagious diseases within the home environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk perception and attitudes towards home energy management systems hems may affect the adoption of disease-containment features in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity and technology anxiety may deter the adoption of smart home technologies with disease-containment features.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly resistant variants of covid-19 continue to emerge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections pose a challenge for disease control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of routine symptom screening for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less accurate antigen rapid tests arts may lead to false negative results, allowing infected individuals to go undetected.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invasive and uncomfortable nature of rt-pcr tests and arts may discourage individuals from getting tested, leading to undiagnosed cases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of continuous monitoring and automation in detection methods may result in delayed identification of infections and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal involvement from users and healthcare professionals in wearable technology may lead to reliance on technology and potential negligence of other diagnostic and preventive measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid proliferation of wearable technology in the healthcare sector may lead to concerns regarding data privacy and security, leading to potential misuse or unauthorized access to sensitive health information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical appraisal of included papers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on a broad overview rather than critical appraisal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
